originalText.text: I work closely with Erinn on the publisher side of affiliate brand strategy and appreciate her support in growing partnerships through effective commission/flat fee discussions for each brand the agency manages that align with the content properties I work with. My experience with the whole team has been top notch!

originalText.text:
This company is a scam company. Before signing a contract, they showed a lot of confidence that made people to believe they can do anything. But after you sign a contract, they suddenly become very conservative. They gave an awful projection, where you would lose more money by using their service. And they would charge a ridiculous amount of fee for the lack of service they are promising. They say it takes time to build up, but the projection doesn’t improve even after 1 year.

When I try to complain about their poor projection, they said I am bound by the contract and threaten to send to collection if I don’t pay.

Everyone, be aware.

originalText.text: PartnerCentric is a trusted resource for Mr. Rebates. Their team is knowledgeable and always there to help grow our business.

originalText.text: Nothing but positive things to say about Partner Centric. The manager and analyst assigned to our account are extremely responsive and go above and beyond to find solutions to our unique challenges

originalText.text: Im getting spam from this company in my PRIVATE email inbox to buy their products and become an affiliate. I never signed up for their harrasing sales emails and there is NO link to unsubscribe because I never subscribed in the first place....I reported them to the ic3.
